title: Add admin login button to landing page

requirements.text: Add a prominent login button to the dashboard landing page (DashboardPage.tsx) that triggers Internet Identity authentication for admin access

quotes: cant login as admin, add login button on landing page

acceptanceCriteria: Login button is visible on the dashboard page without requiring navigation to other pages
Button triggers Internet Identity authentication flow when clicked
Button shows appropriate states (logged in/logged out) based on authentication status
After successful login, user can access admin features

requirements.text: Position the login button in a prominent location on the dashboard page, such as the top-right area near the statistics cards or in the header section

quotes: add login button on landing page

acceptanceCriteria: Login button is easily discoverable on page load
Button placement does not interfere with existing dashboard content (person tabs, statistics, entries table)
Button is responsive and works well on mobile and desktop viewports

requirements.text: Reuse the existing LoginButton component from frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx for consistent authentication behavior across the application
acceptanceCriteria: LoginButton component is imported and rendered on DashboardPage
Authentication state is properly shared between dashboard and other pages
Logout functionality works correctly from the dashboard page

constraints: Do not modify the existing authentication system or Internet Identity integration
Do not change the backend admin access control logic
Preserve existing dashboard functionality (person tabs, statistics, entries table, CSV export)
nonGoals: Creating a new authentication system separate from Internet Identity
Modifying the admin page layout or functionality
Changing how admin permissions are validated on the backend
